rooms.description: Spacious entrance with reception area and foyer. Incorporates Vastu by placing the main entrance on the east or north side, ensuring auspicious energy flow.
Modern living space with contemporary decor. Includes seating areas, ambient lighting, and natural ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
Open-plan dining area adjacent to the living room, designed for social gatherings. Layout optimized for auspicious energy flow with eastward orientation.
Dedicated entertainment zone featuring state-of-the-art sound system and screen technology. Positioned in a quiet corner on the west side to minimize disturbances, as per Vastu guidelines.
Fully equipped modern kitchen with island counter. Placed in the southeast for positive energy flow, following Vastu recommendations.
Essential space for laundry and storage. Located near the kitchen to maintain functional efficiency.

openings.description: Primary entrance door, designed with Vastu alignment on the east or north side to invite positive energy.
Large windows for ample natural light and ventilation, ensuring balanced airflow as per Vastu guidelines.
Vastu-aligned windows to enhance energy flow in dining space.
